titleStmt.title: Moderation's commendation, in a parable· Wherein is set forth the life, death, and resurrection of moderation; together with her nativity, country, pedigree, kindred, character, friends and enemies.
titleStmt.author: N. S.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and three Crowns neer Mercers Chappel in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Sion College Library, London.
